title: What will it cost me to file an answer to a complaint for a collection angency suing me? This is for $4700 for old credit card d
question: This is for and old Wells Fargo Credit card debt. A debt buyer boght the old account.
answers: In LA, it is $225 to file an Answer. You are also able to Request a Fee Waiver if you make below a certain amount per month
If you do not have $225., you need to file 2 forms in order to get a fee waiver. It is easier if you are receiving public assistance of some kind.

If you are planning to file a Chapter 7 in the near future, you might be better off ignoring this lawsuit and directing your efforts to the bankruptcy filing. Of course, you should speak with a bankruptcy attorney to make sure you are qualified and that it will accomplish your goals before you make any decision.

If you ignore the suit, the plaintiff will eventually obtain a judgment against you, but if you file your bankruptcy in the next month or so, you will beat them to the punch and eliminate the debt (along with the other debt you have). The bankruptcy filing will put a stop to the lawsuit immediately, and you'll be protected from the actions of that creditor as well as your other creditors.

Most bankruptcy attorneys offer a free consultation, so you have nothing to lose by speaking with one right away. In the long run, it sounds like it will save you time and money.
Counsel is spot on. Good luck Matt!
